ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:24:30 [Issue ID 4000-407383] urn:comicvine:4000-407383 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 23:48:33. [Issue ID 1489714]
ComicInfo.Summary: In a world of Echoes, existence is never a sure thing. Imagine a technology that could replace anyone with a perfect, indistinguishable copy. In the year 2081 the technology exists in the form of Tactile Holography, also known as Echo Technology. Dreamwave Productions' latest title 'Echo' is a military action drama that follows the exploits of specialized covert government team charged with the task of protecting the world from this hidden threat. This issue launches the 12-issue Echo series and dumps you right into the action as Sho Yamato leads his team on one of their first missions. With machine-like efficiency they perform their mission impeccably, but events take an unexpected turn when they realize their assault is fully anticipated and they have to wonder if there is already a betrayer among them. With stunning manga-styled art by Long Vo, Josh Gainsbrugh and Charles Park and scripted by Dark Minds: Volume 2 writer Ken Siu-Chong. You don't want to miss out on this one!
ComicInfo.Title: Echo Chapter 1: Strangers Among Us
